column5: Compared to an average industry price book ratio of 194 PCG is valued rather cheaply chartmillcomanalyzephpu

PCG Two nuggets from Wednesdays hearing 1 Both Dumas and Singleton lawyers for fire victims explicitly told the court they see no effort by PCG to negotiate and move forward on claims resolution The longer they have exclusivity the longer PCG will slow roll their clients 2 Singleton then explicitly predicted PCG is VERY UNLIKELY to get the relief from fire liabilities from Californias legislature that they seem to be counting He concluded that if PCG the parent company went out of business that would not necessarily be a bad thing In the end Montali who had started the hearing with his instincts to give PCG their full 6 month extension cut it back to a 4 month extension
PCG Great article on CH 11 bankruptcieswsjcomgraphicsbankruptcy
